name: dc-static-assets-builder
description: Static page builder using the DC design system

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p src/assets/css src/assets/fonts src/assets/images && cp -r node_modules/dc-design-system/system/fonts/* src/assets/fonts/ && cp -r node_modules/dc-design-system/system/images/* src/assets/images/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run build:sass && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.dev: npm run copy-assets && npm run build:sass && npm-run-all --parallel watch:*
